title: Self-Awareness
description: Understand who you areâ€”your strengths, weaknesses, values, and passions. This forms the foundation for all personal growth.
action_items: Keep a daily journal for 1 week
Take a personality test (e.g., MBTI or Enneagram)
Ask 3 close friends about your strengths

title: Set Clear Goals
description: Define what success means to you. Set short-term and long-term goals in different areas of life (career, health, relationships, etc.).
action_items: Set a reminder to review goals weekly

title: Learn & Improve
description: Constant learning boosts your self-worth and helps you reach your goals. Read, watch, listen, and take courses.
action_items: Follow 2 motivational YouTube channels or podcasts
Take a free online course (e.g., Coursera, Khan Academy)

title: Practice Discipline
description: Stay consistent with your routines. Build habits that push you closer to your goals even when motivation is low.
action_items: Wake up and sleep at the same time daily

title: Reflect & Adjust
description: Evaluate your growth regularly. Celebrate wins and learn from challenges. Adjust your goals and strategies as needed.
action_items: Do a weekly reflection every Sunday
